sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { getPlaceholderText } from '../../utils/formatters'; function Form({ mode, gender, setGender, season, setSeason, eventType, setEventType, performance, setPerformance, points, setPoints }) { return (
mode === 'points' ? setPerformance(e.target.value) : setPoints(e.target.value)} placeholder={getPlaceholderText(eventType, mode)} pattern={mode === 'points' && ['800m', '1500m', '3000m', '5000m', '10000m'].includes(eventType) ? "^[0-9]{1,2}:[0-5][0-9].[0-9]{2}$" : undefined} />
); } export default Form;
